verses.text: “\w Dominion|strong="H4910"\w* \w and|strong="H6213"\w* \w awe|strong="H6343"\w* belong \w to|strong="H6213"\w* God; \w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w establishes|strong="H6213"\w* harmony \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w heights|strong="H4791"\w* \w of|strong="H6213"\w* \w heaven|strong="H4791"\w*.

\w Can|strong="H4310"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* \w troops|strong="H1416"\w* \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w numbered|strong="H4557"\w*? \w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w His|strong="H5921"\w* light \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*?

\w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w then|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man be \w just|strong="H6663"\w* \w before|strong="H5973"\w* God? \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* one \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w woman|strong="H3205"\w* be \w pure|strong="H2135"\w*?

\w If|strong="H2005"\w* \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* \w does|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* shine, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w stars|strong="H3556"\w* \w are|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w pure|strong="H2141"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w His|strong="H3808"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*,

\w how|strong="H3588"\w* much \w less|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w maggot|strong="H7415"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w worm|strong="H7415"\w*!”
